reqs:
TITLE: Metabolic rate and measurement
DESCRIPTION: This module will focus on understanding and applying techniques for measuring metabolic rate, across both invertebrates and vertebrates. It will give a background to the methods used, the equipment required, and the strengths and limitations afforded by different experimental approaches.
Instructor: Phil MatthewsLocation: BioSci 4223
courseName: Advanced Topics in Biology - ADV TOPICS BIOL
